Thanks Chickenplucker.....loved the airbags you did a while back.!!

Those are doable, the problem is the wheels have to be symmetrical front to back, because symmetry just rotates it around, otherwise you would have to make a left and right version separately. I learn this the hard way after lots of facepalming.

Also the suspensions are kind of "fake", the wheels just go up and down and not in a circular fashion like a real suspension with 4 bar linkages. So it may look a bit off when you have lots of travel.

Ahh right, I get what you mean (I think). So a springy suspension would look better if the springs were verticle?

Regarding the whole symmetry issues, I have come across the issue too with the caterpillar tracks,however EndlessWaves is working on a plugin to force proper symmetry on objects (by negatively scaling the object whilst keeping its properties intact). It hasn't been completed yet but is something to consider for future planning.

The rollcage is great, having lots of fun making things with these. Just an FYI, you only need one model, put your textures in a folder named textures in the RollKageMK1 folder and add texture = name_of_your_texture.png to your cfg. I have 8 colors all in one part.cfg using one model. Should save on memory a little I hope.
